content: HIT-RB Brushing and guiding accessories Injectable mortar accessories for brushing and guiding ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Accessories for fasteners > Hole cleaning accessories ### FEATURES:Features Durable and easier-to-use accessories to simplify anchor setting Helps to facilitate the proper installation of concrete anchors Applications Brushing drilled holes of varying diameters and embedment depths Cleaning dust away from the surface of the hole ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 273203 - Round brush HIT-RB 7/16 - Package Size 1 pc - 273204 - Round brush HIT-RB 1/2 - Package Size 1 pc - 273205 - Round brush HIT-RB 9/16 - Package Size 1 pc - 273207 - Round brush HIT-RB 5/8 - Package Size 1 pc - 273209 - Round brush HIT-RB 11/16 - Package Size 1 pc - 273210 - Round brush HIT-RB 3/4 - Package Size 1 pc - 273211 - Round brush HIT-RB 7/8 - Package Size 1 pc - 273212 - Round brush HIT-RB 1 - Package Size 1 pc - 273214 - Round brush HIT-RB 1-1/8 - Package Size 1 pc - 273216 - Round brush HIT-RB 1-1/4 - Package Size 1 pc - 273217 - Round brush HIT-RB 1-3/8 - Package Size 1 pc - 273218 - Round brush HIT-RB 1-1/2 - Package Size 1 pc - 273219 - Round brush HIT-RB 1-3/4 - Package Size 1 pc - 263437 - Holder TE-C (SDS +) connection - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE - C Holder - 263439 - Holder TE-Y (SDS max) connection - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE - Y Holder - 238727 - Manual brush extension HIT-RBV 11 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x HIT-RBV Brush extension - 371722 - Brush extension HIT-RBS-10/0.35 - Package Size 1 pc - 336645 - Brush extension HIT-RBS-10/0.7 - Package Size 1 pc - 229138 - Manual brush T-handle HIT-RBH - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x HIT-RBH Handle
